# firefly3_category (Resource)

Manages a Firefly III category. Categories allow you to categorize transactions.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Basic category
resource "firefly3_category" "groceries" {
  name = "Groceries"
}

# Category with notes
resource "firefly3_category" "utilities" {
  name  = "Utilities"
  notes = "Gas, electricity, water, and other utility bills"
}

# Multiple categories
resource "firefly3_category" "transportation" {
  name  = "Transportation"
  notes = "Public transport, fuel, parking fees"
}

resource "firefly3_category" "entertainment" {
  name  = "Entertainment"
  notes = "Movies, concerts, streaming services"
}
```

## Import

Categories can be imported using their ID:

```bash
terraform import firefly3_category.groceries 123
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the category.

### Optional

- `notes` (String) A description of the category.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the rule.
